messages.title: What a Labour Government would do for YOU
messages.content:
1. A final say on Brexit. A Labour Government will give you the final say on Brexit and deliver a new referendum.
2. Invest in our NHS. Under the Tories, the NHS and Social Care are in crisis. Labour will invest an extra £30bn in our NHS by 2024.
3. New rights for renters. Labour will improve standards, security and affordability for renters and end 'no fault' evictions.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Labour Government will give you the final say on Brexit and deliver a new referendum.
Labour will invest an extra £30bn in our NHS by 2024.
Labour will improve standards, security and affordability for renters and end 'no fault' evictions.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In 2017 we came within 2,876 votes of winning Reading West. The LibDems and Greens can't win here. Your vote will matter on Thursday 12th December.

issues.brexitEurope: A Labour Government will give you the final say on Brexit and deliver a new referendum.
issues.health: Under the Tories, the NHS and Social Care are in crisis. Labour will invest an extra £30bn in our NHS by 2024.

community.content: Rachel understands the issues that matter to local residents because she has been active in our community for over a decade.

leaflet.personalStatement: On 12th December we have a chance to elect Rachel Eden to be our MP. Rachel understands the issues that matter to local residents because she has been active in our community for over a decade. She will be a fantastic MP for Reading West.

images.caption: Popular local councillor standing to be Reading West MP
